review: He is Such a dedicated doctor I have ever seen, my father is his 12 years long patient, he is always the best with his care and he saved him thrice from  critical conditions we r so grateful for him. Once his patient is admitted there he visits 3 times a day and 7 days a week with complete follow up.

The Appointment was for me it was for my pregnancy check-up. The Doctor was good patient & friendly . The doctor asked me to get some tests done  got to meet the doctor next month with the report after that the doctor is going to prescribe the medications accordingly. I would like to recommend the doctor to others in future.

The Appointment was for my Husband he had high blood pressure. We visited the hospital the doctor was so understandable listened to our problem very patiently tried to solve the problem . The doctor had given good medications I am totally satisfied with the consultation. I would definitely recommend the doctor to others.

I had been to hospital and it was for normal checkup. Consultation was fine by the doctor. ****** ** **** *** ** *** I have already recommended the doctor to my family or friends. He told to use same medicines which was prescribed earlier. Doctor knew me personally too. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. Walking was suggested. Doctor spoke well.

My father in law had been to hospital and it was for minor heart attack. ************ *** **** **** ** *** ******. My wife also had consultation with him. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation for 6 months. Tests, angiogram was done. He was admitted for one day. There was normal waiting time in the hospital when we went. Diet chart was suggested. Doctor was friendly. I have even doctor number as well.

My father had heart problem so went to hospital. ****** *** **** ** ********** ***. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. He also had urinary issues, to check if surgery has to be done or not we consulted. My dad is 70-year-old. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. He had heart hole. Surgery is not done. We have plans to go again. Doctor was friendly.

The best doctor I had seen done angio for my husband 
today  very down to earth humble caring and polite explain all the problem and encourage us with positivity. Simply superb doctor seen in my life. Thank you doctor
His very calm and handle the patient is very good... And clearly tells the all situations in between the case... Such a nice doctor..
